alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:40PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Rapid River Rises for Eastern Interior Rivers Into Friday ... Moderate to heavy rain showers will continue across parts of the Interior through Wednesday evening. Periods of rain will result in an area of 0.5 to 1.25 inches of additional accumulations in the Fortymile Uplands and Salcha/Goodpaster/Chena River Basins through Wednesday evening. This rain will likely cause a rapid rise in river and stream levels across the Southeast Interior. This includes the Chena, Chatanika, Goodpaster, and the Fortymile Rivers. A flood watch has been issued for the Salcha River, see the associated flood watch for more details regarding the Salcha River. The other rivers are not expected to flood. People along rivers and streams should prepare for elevated water levels through this week. River access points and gravel bars will likely be covered with water along with increased debris in rivers. http://weather.gov/aprfc

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
